In an urgent situation? Borrow this promo from us, then pay later on your next reload.

The total loan amount (regular price + service fee) will be automatically deducted upon your next reload. You can also pay manually by texting PAY LOAN to 3733. Just make sure that you have enough load to cover for your unpaid loaned amount + the corresponding service fee before texting.
You will receive a text to confirm your loan request. You can use it once it’s approved.
Please try to make a borrow request or change your mobile number.

You will receive your OTP after logging in to your modem’s inbox.

 1. Make sure you are connected to your HPW WiFi.
 2. Press “Go to my modem inbox” below
 3. Log in to your modem dashboard using the user and password information found at the back or bottom of your modem.
 4. Retrieve OTP in the modem SMS inbox.

1. Open your last/current billing statement.\n2. In your bill, you will find the monthly service fee under your statement summary.

This promo is eligible for a raffle draw for HPW/MyFi users!
Buy an HPW device in our shop, add accounts, or buy promos here in GlobeOne app to earn raffle entries!
Your raffle entries will be eligible when you complete your profile.
To enter your raffle tickets, fill out all the required fields (*) in the form. \n\nRaffles are open to customers 18 years old and above. You can still enjoy the other features of GlobeOne!
By giving this information, I consent to the collection and processing of my information. This information will be subject to
Please enter your location’s 4-digit zip code.
Certify that all statements are true and correct.

Winners will be contacted after the raffle draw and will be asked to show proof of identity. To win GCash prizes, please make sure that the number you entered is a valid and verified GCash number. To know if your GCash number is valid and verified, please check here. \n\n In the event that any information were found to be invalid after the raffle draw, it is Globe’s prerogative to disqualify and re-draw a valid winner.
Are you sure you want to skip completing your profile?

Incomplete profiles will not earn raffle entries. Raffle period is from August to October 2021 and raffle draw is done weekly. You might miss your chance to win this week. Do you still want to proceed?
We will seed your new tickets in a few minutes. Please wait for a confirmation message.
